element.name: Basolateral Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Lateral_part_of_basal_amygdaloid_nucleus Lateral part of basal amygdaloid nucleus]

element.name: Mediolateral Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_part_of_basal_amygdaloid_nucleus Medial part of basal amygdaloid nucleus]

element.name: Lateral Central Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Lateral_central_nucleus_of_the_amygdala Lateral central nucleus of the amygdala]

element.name: Medial Central Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_central_nucleus_of_the_amygdala Medial central nucleus of the amygdala]

element.name: Accumbens Nucleus
element.notes: inhibitory nucleus

element.name: Basal Nucleus of Meynert
element.notes: ACh source, attention; modulatory nucleus

element.name: Bed Nucleus of Stria Terminalis
element.function: Mediate slow longer-lasting responses that accompany sustained threats
element.notes: Major output from AM to HT, part of extended amygdala

element.name: Oval Bed Nucleus of Stria Terminalis
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Bed_nuclei_of_the_stria_terminalis_oval_nucleus Bed nuclei of the stria terminalis oval nucleus]

element.name: Lateral Bed Nucleus of Stria Terminalis
Medial Bed Nucleus of Stria Terminalis
Caudate Nucleus
element.function: Excitation of correct action schemas and selection of appropriate sub-goals based on evaluation of action-outcomes
element.notes: One of neural correlates of romantic love; inhibitory nucleus

element.name: Putamen
element.notes: Regulate movements and influence various types of learning; inhibitory nucleus

element.name: Globus Pallidus External
element.function: Regulate and focus activity patterns in striatum, STN, GPi, and SNpr
element.notes: inhibitory nucleus

element.name: Globus Pallidus Internal
element.function: Output nuclei of basal ganglia to neocortex
element.notes: Balance of direct and indirect paths, GPM; inhibitory nucleus

element.name: Substantia Nigra Pars Compacta
element.notes: Supply striatum with dopamine, input to Basal Ganglia

element.name: Substantia Nigra Pars Reticulata
element.function: Convey final processed signals of basal ganglia to thalamus and superior colliculus
element.notes: inhibitory nucleus

element.name: Endopiriform Nucleus
element.function: Putative relay of limbic-associated cortical-like areas subserving affective information

element.name: Dentate Gyrus
element.function: Distinguishing multiple instances of similar events

element.name: Ventrolateral Cornu Ammonis of Hippocampus
element.function: Representing sequences of episodic memory - long-term

element.name: Dorsolateral Cornu Ammonis of Hippocampus
element.function: Gate controlled by the activity of the supramammillary nucleus to control signal propagation between HC lamines
element.notes: Hippocampus. Receives theta rithm input from Septum Nucleus

element.name: Dorsomedial Cornu Ammonis of Hippocampus
element.function: Representing sequences of episodic memory - short-term

element.name: Ventromedial Cornu Ammonis of Hippocampus
element.function: Mediate dynamic regulation of pattern separation in the dentate gyrus

element.name: Interstitial Anterior Commissural Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Interstitial_nucleus_of_the_posterior_limb_of_the_anterior_commissure Interstitial nucleus of the posterior limb of the anterior commissure]
element.notes: Related to the central extended amygdala

element.name: Septal Nucleus
element.function: Inhibition of fear and expression of pleasurable responses

element.name: Ventral Pallidum
element.notes: Necessary for reward learning and performance; inhibitory nucleus

element.name: Anteroventral Periventricular Nucleus
element.notes: Abundant of nuclear hormone receptors, sexual differentiation

element.name: Anterior Nucleus of Hypothalamus Anterior Part
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Anterior_nucleus_of_hypothalamus_anterior_part Anterior nucleus of hypothalamus anterior part]

element.name: Anterior Nucleus of Hypothalamus Central Part
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Anterior_nucleus_of_hypothalamus_central_part Anterior nucleus of hypothalamus central part]

element.name: Anterior Nucleus of Hypothalamus Dorsal Part
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Anterior_nucleus_of_hypothalamus_dorsal_part Anterior nucleus of hypothalamus dorsal part]

element.name: Anterior Nucleus of Hypothalamus Posterior Part
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Anterior_nucleus_of_hypothalamus_posterior_part Anterior nucleus of hypothalamus posterior part]

element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_nucleus_of_the_hypothalamus_descending_division_-_lateral_parvicellular_part Paraventricular nucleus of the hypothalamus descending division - lateral parvicellular part]

element.name: Medial Preoptic Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_preoptic_nucleus Medial preoptic nucleus];NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Median_preoptic_nucleus Median preoptic nucleus];NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_preoptic_region Medial preoptic region]

element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_part_of_the_medial_preoptic_nucleus Medial part of the medial preoptic nucleus]

element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Principal_anterior_division_of_supraoptic_nucleus Principal anterior division of supraoptic nucleus]

element.name: Arcuate Nucleus of Hypothalamus
element.function: Regulation of growth, appetite and body weight

element.name: Intermediate Periventrical Nucleus
element.notes: Produce regulatory hormones

element.name: Tuber Cinereum
element.notes: Sole source of histamine

element.name: Posterior Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Posterior_hypothalamic_region Posterior hypothalamic region];NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Posterior_nucleus_of_hypothalamus Posterior nucleus of hypothalamus]

element.name: Lateral Geniculate Nucleus
element.notes: Only 10% of inputs to LGN come from the retina. 90% are modulatory inputs from cortex and the brainstem

element.name: Dorsolateral Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Dorsal_nucleus_of_lateral_geniculate_body Dorsal nucleus of lateral geniculate body]

element.name: Intergeniculate Leaflet of Lateral Geniculate Complex
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Intergeniculate_leaflet_of_the_lateral_geniculate_complex Intergeniculate leaflet of the lateral geniculate complex]

element.name: Ventrolateral Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Ventral_nucleus_of_lateral_geniculate_body Ventral nucleus of lateral geniculate body]

element.name: Lateral Mammillary Nucleus
element.function: Generate theta rythm and relay to HC
element.notes: Memory, recognition, spatial awareness, and interpreting the context of events

element.name: Medial Mammillary Nucleus
element.function: Relay for impulses coming from AM and HC
element.notes: Memory, recognition, spatial awareness, and interpreting the context of events

element.name: Mediolateral Mammillary Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Lateral_part_of_medial_mammillary_nucleus Lateral part of medial mammillary nucleus]

element.name: Medial Part of Medial Mammillary Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_part_of_medial_mammillary_nucleus Medial part of medial mammillary nucleus]

element.name: Medial Geniculate Body
element.function: Detection of the relative intensity and duration of a sound, relay to Auditory Cortex

element.name: Anterodorsal Nucleus of Medial Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Anterodorsal_nucleus_of_medial_geniculate_body Anterodorsal nucleus of medial geniculate body]

element.name: Dorsal Nucleus of Medial Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Dorsal_nucleus_of_medial_geniculate_body Dorsal nucleus of medial geniculate body]

element.name: Magnocellular Nucleus of Medial Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Magnocellular_nucleus_of_medial_geniculate_body Magnocellular nucleus of medial geniculate body]

element.name: Medial Nucleus of Medial Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_nucleus_of_medial_geniculate_body Medial nucleus of medial geniculate body]

element.name: Posterodorsal Nucleus of Medial Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Posterodorsal_nucleus_of_medial_geniculate_body Posterodorsal nucleus of medial geniculate body]

element.name: Ventral Nucleus of Medial Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Ventral_nucleus_of_medial_geniculate_body Ventral nucleus of medial geniculate body]

element.name: Medial Pulvinar
element.function: Integration of associative cortical information and projects to visuomotor-related cortex
element.notes: CG, PMC, PFC connections

element.name: Oral Pulvinar
element.notes: Thalamus, connected with parietal cortex, anterior pulvinar

element.name: Retina
element.function: Spatial decorrelation through center surround inhibition
element.notes: 100:1 cones/rods to ganglion cells aggregation, edge extraction

element.name: Subthalamus
element.notes: Dysfunction increases impulsivity in case of two equally rewarded stimuli

element.name: Nucleus of Forel Field
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Nucleus_of_field_H_of_Forel Nucleus of field H of Forel]

element.name: Anterior Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: Projects to L4 of presubiculum and receives from postsubiculum, also to CG, RSP; spatial learning and memory; attentional processes; head direction

element.name: Centromedian Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Control of level of cortical activity
element.notes: Lesions lead to persistent vegetative state

element.name: Parafascicular Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Stimulation of acetylcholine release in dorsal striata
element.notes: Part of ascending activating system

element.name: Lateral Parafascicular Thalamic Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Lateral_part_of_the_parafascicular_thalamic_nucleus Lateral part of the parafascicular thalamic nucleus]

element.name: Rostral Intralaminar Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: from brainstem to SPL.SA, CM, CL, CeM, PC

element.name: Lateral Dorsal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: From RSP L5,6 BA17,18, RT, LGN

element.name: Lateral Posterior Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: From superior colliculus, pretectum

element.name: Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Attention, planning, organization, abstract thinking, multi-tasking, and active memory
element.notes: Relay AM to FCA.LPFC, FCA.OMPFC

element.name: Densocellular Part of Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Densocellular_part_of_medial_dorsal_nucleus Densocellular part of medial dorsal nucleus]

element.name: Magnocellular Part of Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Magnocellular_part_of_medial_dorsal_nucleus Magnocellular part of medial dorsal nucleus]

element.name: Paralaminar Part of Medial Dorsal Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paralaminar_part_of_medial_dorsal_nucleus Paralaminar part of medial dorsal nucleus]

element.name: Parvicellular Part of Medial Dorsal Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Parvicellular_part_of_medial_dorsal_nucleus Parvicellular part of medial dorsal nucleus]

element.comment: birds-only equivalent of Pulvinar for motion processing

element.name: Paratenial Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Direct behavior toward a particular outcome over a range of outcomes
element.notes: Projects to BNST, AM, OMPFC, ET

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Direct behavior toward a particular outcome over a range of outcomes
element.notes: Projects like PT, but more to BNST, AM

element.name: Reuniens Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Gate information between OMPFC and HC dependent upon attentive/arousal states
element.notes: Regulate amount of neural traffic with changes in attentiveness

element.name: Rhomboidal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Communication of information across memory delays to guide memory responses
element.notes: like RE, return projection from PFC to HC, spatial working memory

element.name: Subfascicular Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Relays from PAG to Rhape nuclei, Inferior olive nucleus

element.name: Limitans Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: From SC, trigeminal nucleus, superior and inferior colliculus

element.name: Suprageniculate Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: From tectum, somatic sensations

element.name: Submedial Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: Projections from SC Lamina I, trigeminal nucleus to ACC

element.name: Ventral Anterior Nucleus
element.function: Relay BGA.SN, BGA.GPI, FCA.OMPFC, FCA.CG to MCA.PMC, MCA.SMC
element.notes: Cognitive motor

element.name: Magnocellular Part of Ventral Anterior Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Magnocellular_part_of_ventral_anterior_nucleus Magnocellular part of ventral anterior nucleus]

element.name: Parvicellular Part of Ventral Anterior Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Parvicellular_part_of_ventral_anterior_nucleus Parvicellular part of ventral anterior nucleus]

element.name: Ventral Lateral Nucleus
element.notes: Executive motor

element.name: Caudal Part of Ventral Lateral Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Caudal_part_of_ventral_lateral_nucleus Caudal part of ventral lateral nucleus]

element.name: Medial Part of Ventral Lateral Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_part_of_ventral_lateral_nucleus Medial part of ventral lateral nucleus]

element.name: Oral Part of Ventral Lateral Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Oral_part_of_ventral_lateral_nucleus Oral part of ventral lateral nucleus]

element.name: Pars Postrema of Ventral Lateral Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Pars_postrema_of_ventral_lateral_nucleus Pars postrema of ventral lateral nucleus]

element.name: Ventral Posteroinferior Nucleus
element.function: Relays pain and temperature from body to insula

element.name: Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus
element.function: Relays somatic information from body to S1

element.name: Caudal Part of Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Caudal_part_of_ventral_posterolateral_nucleus Caudal part of ventral posterolateral nucleus]

element.name: Oral Part of Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Oral_part_of_ventral_posterolateral_nucleus Oral part of ventral posterolateral nucleus]

element.name: Ventral Posteromedial Nucleus
element.function: Relays somatic information from face to S1

element.name: Parvicellular Part of Ventral Posteromedial Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Parvicellular_part_of_ventral_posteromedial_nucleus Parvicellular part of ventral posteromedial nucleus]

element.name: Principal Part of Ventral Posteromedial Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Principal_part_of_ventral_posteromedial_nucleus Principal part of ventral posteromedial nucleus]
